trans-unit.source: There was a problem validating your password reset request
trans-unit.target: There was a problem validating your password reset request

trans-unit.source: There was a problem handling your password reset request
trans-unit.target: There was a problem handling your password reset request

trans-unit.source: The link in your email is expired. Please try to reset your password again.
trans-unit.target: Linket i din e-mail er udløbet. Prøv at nulstille din adgangskode igen.

trans-unit.source: Please update the request_password_repository configuration in config/packages/reset_password.yaml to point to your "request password repository" service.
trans-unit.target: Please update the request_password_repository configuration in config/packages/reset_password.yaml to point to your "request password repository" service.

trans-unit.source: The reset password link is invalid. Please try to reset your password again.
trans-unit.target: Linket til at nulstille adgangskode er ugyldigt. Prøv at nulstille din adgangskode igen.

trans-unit.source: You have already requested a reset password email. Please check your email or try again soon.
trans-unit.target: You have already requested a reset password email. Please check your email or try again soon.
